Structs/RTMSubscriptionConfig.html#/s:9S.name: init(channel:position:age:count:fastForward:useLastSeenPositionWhenResubscribing:)
Structs/RTMSubscriptionConfig.html#/s:9S.abstract: Create a RTMSubscriptionConfig for a single channel subscription.

Structs/RTMSubscriptionConfig.html#/s:9S.name: init(subscriptionId:view:position:age:count:fastForward:useLastSeenPositionWhenResubscribing:)
Structs/RTMSubscriptionConfig.html#/s:9S.abstract: Create a RTMSubscriptionConfig for a view with explicit subscription_id.

Structs/RTMSubscriptionConfig.html.name: RTMSubscriptionConfig
Structs/RTMSubscriptionConfig.html.abstract: RTMSubscriptionConfig holds the arguments for a subscription request.

Enums/RTMClientEvent.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.name: Disconnected
Enums/RTMClientEvent.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.abstract: Connection to RTM was closed, error is provided if available

Enums/RTMClientEvent.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.name: GeneralError
Enums/RTMClientEvent.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.abstract: Client received an RTM PDU with /error action

Enums/RTMClientError.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.name: Disconnected
Enums/RTMClientError.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.abstract: Method failed because of underlying websocket disconnect

Enums/RTMClientError.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.name: AuthenticationFailed
Enums/RTMClientError.html#/s:9SatoriRTM1.abstract: RTMClient constructor was able to connect, but authentication failed

Enums/RTMAuthProvider.html#/s:9SatoriRTM.name: NoAuthProvider
Enums/RTMAuthProvider.html#/s:9SatoriRTM.abstract: Perform no additional authentication, use the default role

Enums/RTMSolicitedResult.html#/s:9Satori.name: Disconnect
Enums/RTMSolicitedResult.html#/s:9Satori.abstract: A disconnect happened before the reply had a chance to arrive

Enums/RTMSolicitedResult.html.name: RTMSolicitedResult
Enums/RTMSolicitedResult.html.abstract: RTMSolicitedResult represents a result of an RTM request such as rtm/subscribe or rtm/write.

Enums/RTMSubscriptionEvent.html.name: RTMSubscriptionEvent
Enums/RTMSubscriptionEvent.html.abstract: RTMSubscriptionEvent describes everything that might happen with a subscription.

Enums/RTMAuthProvider.html.name: RTMAuthProvider
Enums/RTMAuthProvider.html.abstract: RTMAuthProvider is given to RTMClient constructor to specify authentication scheme.

Enums/RTMClientError.html.name: RTMClientError
Enums/RTMClientError.html.abstract: RTMClientError is an enum of errors that can be thrown by RTMClient methods

Enums/RTMClientEvent.html.name: RTMClientEvent
Enums/RTMClientEvent.html.abstract: RTMClientEvent describes everything that might happen with a client

Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.name: on(_:)
Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.abstract: Observe client events. The callback will be called on callbackQueue

Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.name: start()
Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.abstract: Start a client. To be notified about the moment when the connection is established and authentication (if any) is performed,

Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.name: stop()
Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.abstract: Stop the client. A stopped client can be restarted (authentication will be restored, but not subscriptions).

Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.name: subscribe(config:onEvent:)
Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.abstract: Perform rtm/subscribe request. The subscription event callback will be called on callbackQueue.

Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.name: enableAutomaticReconnects()
Classes/RTMClient.html#/s:9SatoriRTM9RTM.abstract: Enable automatic reconnections after disconnects. Newly connected client

Classes/RTMClient.html.name: RTMClient
Classes/RTMClient.html.abstract: RTMClient object represents a connection to Satori RTM service
